definition: beneficial bird (esp. one that preys on insect pests or mice)
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: In fact, the owl is a beneficial bird, which is the vole's natural enemies.
sentences.chinese: 其实，猫头鹰是一种益鸟，它是田鼠的天敌。

sentences.english: The owl is a useful bird.

definition: pest bird (esp. one that feeds on farm crops or newly hatched fish)
(bird species of China) azure-winged magpie (Cyanopica cyanus)
(bird species of China) light-vented bulbul (Pycnonotus sinensis)
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) white-cheeked starling (Spodiopsar cineraceus)
(bird species of China) barn swallow (Hirundo rustica)
(bird species of China) common blackbird (Turdus merula)
(bird species of China) red-billed blue magpie (Urocissa erythroryncha)
